segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even realize her foot is in a puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she’s completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m impressed by his determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting so patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how oblivious the woman is to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading over the sink, and she doesn’t even glance at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the chaos inside is perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments that will end in laughter or tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m rooting for the kids to get away with their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR
